## [[{{< iconify logos:julia >}}]{style="font-size: 2em;"}[{{< iconify streamline-ultimate-color:business-deal-handshake-1 >}}]{style="font-size: 2em;"}[{{< iconify devicon:jupyter-wordmark >}}]{style="font-size:2em;"}](https://www.geeksforgeeks.org/julia/how-to-work-with-julia-on-jupyter-notebook/)  

:::{.panel-tabset}
### {{< iconify devicon:jupyter-wordmark >}}[lab]{.juplab} installation

::: {.smaller}

::: {.columns}

::: {.column width="47%"}

1. [install {{< iconify devicon:python-wordmark >}}](https://www.python.org/downloads/)
2. [access command prompt:{{< iconify flat-color-icons:command-line >}}](https://en.wikiversity.org/wiki/Command_Prompt/Open)
3. type `pip install jupyterlab`
4. [navigate](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/windows-server/administration/windows-commands/cd) to project folder
5. type `jupyter lab`

:::

::: {.column width="5%"}
:::

::: {.column width="48%"}

Other options:  

+ [anaconda](https://www.anaconda.com/download)/[miniconda](https://www.anaconda.com/docs/getting-started/miniconda/main)  
+ [{{< iconify devicon:jupyter-wordmark >}}[lab]{.juplab} desktop](https://github.com/jupyterlab/jupyterlab-desktop)  
+ [{{< iconify devicon:github-wordmark >}} codespaces](https://docs.github.com/en/codespaces/quickstart)
  + {{< iconify devicon:vscode >}} vs {{< iconify devicon:jupyter-wordmark >}}[lab]{.juplab} interface ([{{< iconify logos:youtube-icon  >}}](https://youtu.be/mKbXIDhdeL0?t=105))

:::

:::

:::
